1.storytext:
Story

Each element of diary is called a story.
Use stories to write about your feelings or thoughs.
When you finish some task you can add it to your story. Just mark some task as finished by clicking on its checkbox and select it on your story's bottom
pannel. After that press on Save button to completely bind task to your story.
If you decide to delete your story press and hold Delete button. Be careful it is irreversible and all your progress will be lost.
